sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 12 cm and a height of 8 cm. What is the area of the parallelogram?
message_2:
The area of a parallelogram can be calculated using the formula: Area = base × height.

In this case, the base is 12 cm and the height is 8 cm. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 12 cm × 8 cm = 96 square centimeters.
